attributes.review: This GODFORSAKEN APP has ruined iphones for me for the REST OF MY LIFE! When i downloaded it sent me to Safari where it played an incredibly loud recording of Donald Trump saying “Gyna”. My grandmother, who is ill was SO SPOOKED BY THIS RANDOM OCCURRENCE that she tripped and FELL DOWN MY STAIRS. She has broken over 27 bones and in terrible condition at the hospital. Not ONLY THAT but once I finally had the chance to open the app it CRASHED 800 TIMES!!! I have never been this offended by an application in my life, nevertheless one written, coded, and designed by our OWN PRESIDENT!! #BAD!!!
attributes.title: APP ATTACK!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately got bad luck. My dog ran away and got ran over multiple times in front of me and my toddler son so he’s now traumatized for life and will probably kill me in my sleep. Then my boss called me and told me I was fired for being too good at my job he didn’t give me a reason but once I got this app bad things happened. Take it from me you don’t want this app near you or your house hold it’s for your own good
attributes.title: Worst thing in the galaxy

attributes.review:
this app is awful. it used my mic and camera to watch me. then, it drained all of my battery in 2 minutes. when my phone charged, i tried opening the app and it kept crashing. 
it finally opened after loading for 25 minutes, but then it told me to vote for biden and turned my phone into a brick.
all of this happened 1 week ago. apple couldn’t fix my phone so i had to buy a new one. 
THIS APP IS DANGEROUS. DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: i’d give 0 stars if i could

attributes.review: I am absolutely horrified with how poorly made this app is!🤬🤬As soon as I opened it I could feel how dirty and disgusting it was🤮🤢I had to close out of it immediately so I wouldn’t vomit!!  I went to bed hoping things would get better, but when I woke up I could feel I had a very serious illness!! 😱😰Then, I went to the doctor and they confirmed that I had not only contracted this life threatening sickeness, but I had contracted every single STD!!!!🤭😳😫😫🤬🤬🤬THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE!!!!!!!!😖😖😭😭😭😩😡🤬🤬
attributes.title: This APP gave me a LIFE THREATENING DISEASE!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app on July 7, 2020 and it took a full day to completely be downloaded onto my mobile device. I was able to download other apps and platforms completely fine except this one. After the app was complete and ready for use it began glitching and let out little noises. I’ve tried several times to login my information, but each attempt failed. Never purchasing this app again!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORST!

attributes.review:
This app stinks and it glitches to this orange clown’s face sometimes and I hate it!!!!!1!1!! It’s very ugly and if you could fix this I’d be very happy. But that’s not the only problem it stinks. Not in the sense that it’s bad. (I mean it is 🤪) but in the sense that it smells like trash smothered in diarrhea with expired
Milk poured over it. But wait, that’s not all. It’s telling me to vote for this clown but why would I? He’s a literal clown. No wait, the whole circus. So overall, the app is horrendous. Please fix this.
attributes.title: This most stink app ever ew!!!!1!1! 😡😡😡

attributes.review: if i could have given it less than a star i would, i had so many technical difficulties, to begin with, i could not believe that someone would make an app about an orange! what a waste when people could be making much cooler apps! i was also shocked when i saw that it even had 2 stars, why would someone support a racist! anyways thanks for reading and support blm!!!! also stop being a troompa loompa, it’s a bit- it’s just wrong! ;)
attributes.title: THE WORST

attributes.review: U downloaded this app because I love our orange god. But immediately when I opened the app my phone shut off and telemarketers from India and iran kept on calling me. My number was leaked to all the hitmen in America and I am currently on the run. My personal info has been leaked to many traffickers all around the world. My social security was leaked and my family was killed by hitmen. Please give this app a 1 star rating because I will be dead in 10 minutes.
attributes.title: It destroyed my life!!!

attributes.review: I’m being 100 percent serious, this app is not helpful at all, it made my phone glitch and I couldn’t even open the app after downloaded. It took a couple try’s but then the app finally loaded and then it showed me the most vile photo. I closed the app so fast. I will never recover from what I saw, an ugly fat orange no good dirty ompa lompa lookin nasty kangaroo jumpin pedo with the most thin and balding hair. I think I’m going to need therapy after what I’ve seen. THE MOST HORRIBLE APP ON THE APP STORE 🤡🤡🤡🤡👁👅👁
attributes.title: This isn’t a joke

attributes.review: When I purchased the app it took soooooo long to download and I couldn’t use any other apps during the download. When I finally got into the app it kept on asking me if I liked Cheetos or oranges and I clearly don’t. After I said no it gave me a virus. It took me days to delete the app and get rid of the virus. I would love to talk about how this app could improve, but i need to go walk my fish to the post office. Therefore I DO NOT vibe with this app. 💖💘🥰💝💕💞😻💓💗❣️😘💛💜❤️🧡💟✨😍
attributes.title: I DO NOT vibe with this app👎🤬🤡💔
